public class QueryHelper
extends java.lang.Object

QueryHelper class provides helper methods for query construction.

Method Detail

getAllSelectQueryClauses

public static java.lang.String getAllSelectQueryClauses(java.util.Map options)
Returns a query clause for SELECT statement by constructing a clause which consists of GROUP BY, HAVING and ORDER BY clauses if there is any as specified in the options.

Parameters:
options -
Returns:
a SQL fragment

getOrderBy

public static java.lang.String getOrderBy(java.util.Map options)
Constructs ORDER BY clause in a SQL statement. Empty string is returned if there is no options for this clause.

Parameters:
options -
Returns:
a SQL fragment
